import React, { useState } from "react"; import Sidebar from "../components/Sidebar"; import Footer from "../components/Footer"; const MyFavorites = () => { const [favoriteAds, setFavoriteAds] = useState([ { id: 1, name: "Modern Kitchen", date: "Nov-25-2019 , 16:54 pm", category: "Apartments", price: "$89", status: "Active", img: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1600585154340-be6161a56a0c", type: "Sale", marked: false, }, { id: 2, name: "Villa", date: "Nov-22-2019 , 9:18 am", category: "Homes", price: "$14,000", status: "Closed", img: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1560448075-bb485b65be14", type: "Sale", marked: false, }, { id: 3, name: "2BHK Rooms", date: "Nov-15-2019 , 12:45 pm", category: "RealEstate", price: "$22,765", status: "Sold", img: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1507089947368-19c1da9775ae", type: "Buy", marked: false, }, { id: 4, name: "Luxury Rooms", date: "Nov-03-2019 , 12:50 pm", category: "Deluxe Houses", price: "$35,978", status: "Inactive", img: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1505692794403-34cb0b3b8bd1", type: "Sale", marked: false, }, ]); const toggleMark = (id) => { setFavoriteAds((prev) => prev.map((ad) => ad.id === id ? { ...ad, marked: !ad.marked } : ad ) ); }; return (

My Favorite Ads

{/* NEW */} {favoriteAds.map((ad) => ( {/* NEW MARK SECTION */} ))}

); }; export default MyFavorites;
